Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

AIL_sequence_volume

The function AIL_sequence_volume returns the current sequence volume scaling value, from 0 (minimum) to 127 (maximum).

S32 AIL_sequence_volume(
  HSEQUENCE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sequence handle whose volume is to be returned.

Returns

The sequence's current volume-scaling value.

Discussion

See AIL_set_sequence_volume for more information.


Group: XMIDI Services
Related Functions: AIL_XMIDI_master_volume, AIL_set_sequence_volume
Related Basic Types: HSEQUENCE, S32
